name: @anglr/md-help
description: Angular module containing basic implementation of markdown help interpreter

scripts.build: npm run build:node && npm run build:web && npm run build:mermaid
scripts.clean: rimraf dist tests **/tsdoc-metadata.json web/**/*.d.ts web/**/*.d.ts.map mermaid/**/*.d.ts mermaid/**/*.d.ts.map */*.metadata.json ./*.metadata.json ./*.d.ts ./*d.ts.map */dist
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:deps
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run bundle && npm run version:placeholder && npm run version:git
scripts.postpublish: npm run doc && npm run version:placeholder && npm run clean
scripts.bundle: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run clean:duplicates
scripts.doc: path-exists docs && npm run doc:generate || echo "No docs generated!"
scripts.doc:generate: npm run doc:generate:web && npm run doc:generate:mermaid && npm run doc:save
scripts.doc:save: cd docs && git add . && git commit -m "INT: updated API docs ng-md-help" && git push && cd ..
scripts.doc:generate:web: rimraf docs/content/api/ng-md-help && npm run doc:json:web && npm run doc:md:web
scripts.doc:md:web: api-documenter markdown -i web/temp -o docs/content/api/ng-md-help && rimraf web/temp
scripts.doc:generate:mermaid: rimraf docs/content/api/ng-md-help-mermaid && npm run doc:json:mermaid && npm run doc:md:mermaid
scripts.doc:md:mermaid: api-documenter markdown -i mermaid/temp -o docs/content/api/ng-md-help-mermaid && rimraf mermaid/temp

author: kukjevov
